context_bundle.summary: Jaeger is a distributed tracing system for monitoring and troubleshooting transactions in complex microservices environments

onboarding.quick_start: kubectl create namespace observability && helm install jaeger jaegertracing/jaeger --namespace observability --set allInOne.enabled=true && kubectl get svc -n observability jaeger-query
common_patterns: All-in-one deployment: 'helm install jaeger jaegertracing/jaeger --set allInOne.enabled=true'
Query UI: Access at http://jaeger-query:16686 and search by service name and operation
known_errors: No traces found: 'curl http://jaeger-collector:14268/api/traces' and verify application instrumentation
Storage connection failed: 'kubectl logs -n observability jaeger-collector' and check Elasticsearch connection
High memory usage: 'helm upgrade --set allInOne.resources.requests.memory=1Gi' and adjust resource limits
Query timeout: 'kubectl port-forward svc/jaeger-query 16686:16686' and check network connectivity
Agent not collecting: 'kubectl logs -n observability jaeger-agent' and verify host network and ports
